product_name: Belknap Belknap's Waterproof Desolation Canyon River Guide - 3rd Edition
long_description: The expanded and updated. Authors: Buzz Belknap and Loie Belknap Evans. Softcover; 98 pages; black and white photographs and maps. Published by Westwater Books; copyright 2012. Features mile-by-mile information on water levels, rapids, camps, history and geology for rafters and kayakers. Updated edition includes expanded sections on the archeology and geology of the area, information on wildlife and plant life, and new trip-planning pages. Waterproof pages are designed to get wet without falling apart or the ink running.
short_description: The expanded and updated Belknap's Waterproof Desolation Canyon River Guide offers detailed information on the 200 mi. trip from Split Mountain to the town of Green River, Utah.
